name: Use of Remote.exe
description: Remote.exe is part of WinDbg in the Windows SDK and can be used for AWL bypass and running remote files.
false_positives: Approved installs of Windows SDK with Debugging Tools for Windows (WinDbg).
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\remote.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:remote.exe)`
